author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Get a 3-Day Free Trial of Nebula to watch Lindsay Ellis, exclusives from me, and much more at https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

Watch my debut film Boomers exclusively on Nebula here: https://nebula.tv/boomers?ref=tomnicholas

A video about an incredibly unpopular Prime Minister, Keir Starmer, and how he might be able to save Britain before he's forced to resign.

Written, directed, and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Production assistance by Jack Carter.

*Chapters*
00:00 Dear Keir Starmer
03:01 Fix 1: Electoral Reform
08:13 Fix 2: Media Reform
12:43 Fix 3: Housing
18:35 Fix 4: Sack Morgan McSweeney
22:48 Fix 5: End "No Friends to the Left"
27:38 Fix 6: Sign Up to Nebula

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Nebula at https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-43-months-to-save-britain

Support my work on Patreon at https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

Twitter: http://twitter.com/tom_nicholas
Instagram: http://instagram
title: 43 Months to Save Britain
